Row.Text: Quick animations for player turns. This mod disables the Quick Movement/Combat settings in the main menu. Use these instead.
Quick animations for barbarian turns. They are at war with everyone, so these settings always apply.
Quick animations for city state turns. These settings apply during peace with the player, on war they switch to "Computer - War" settings.
Quick animations for allied city state turns. These settings apply when a city state is allied with the player, on war they switch to "Computer - War" settings.
Quick animations for computer civilization turns. These settings apply during peace with the player, on war they switch to "Computer - War" settings.
Quick animations for computer civilization and city state turns. These settings apply during war with the player.
If enabled, sets the "Computer - War" settings for computer civilizations or city states that share an enemy with the player.
If enabled, sets the "Computer - War" settings for computer civilizations that are at war with player's allied city states.
Hover cursor over text labels for more detailed information.
Some settings will only apply after the current turn ends.
